caption.center: STATE OF HAWAI'I, Respondent-Plaintiff-Appellee, v. DAVID ISAO KEAO,

opinion.posture: CERTIORARI TO THE INTERMEDIATE COURT OF APPEALS (CR. NO. 08-1-1778).
opinion.attorneys:
Daphne E. Barbee for petitioner on the application.
Donn Fudo, Deputy Prosecuting Attorney, for respondent on the response.

center.underline: ORDER REJECTING APPLICATION FOR WRIT OF CERTIORARI

opinion.opinion_byline:
By: NAKAYAMA, J., for the court.[fn1]
[fn1] Considered by: Recktenwald, C.J., Nakayama, Acoba, and Duffy, JJ., and Circuit Judge Crandall, assigned by reason of vacancy.
opinion.opinion_text: Petitioner-Defendant-Appellant's application for writ of certiorari filed on November 24, 2010, is hereby rejected.
